price: Fakkaataa isaa (doonii Nuuh) irraas waan isaan yaabbatan isaaniif uumneerra.
arabic: وَخَلَقۡنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثۡلِهِۦ مَا يَرۡكَبُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wakhalaqnā lahum min mith'lihi mā yarkabūna
